name: HeavenQuest Demo
description:
You wake to the smell of singed meat.
'Ooh, delicious', you think, until you realise that it is your body meat that is singed.
You are naked, and lying on your back in a smoldering crater.
Deciding that you like your body meat rare, you get up and walk out of the crater.
You have no recollection of how you got here- or of anything at all, really. You can, however, remember your name.
-What is your name?-

This is just a demo. I made it to see if making text games with Python is fun. However I cannot express with words how not fun it is. Please please use something else to make a game if you are interested in that kind of thing.
